titleStmt.title: Concerning good-morrow, and good-even; the worlds customs: but by the light which into the world is come, by it made manifest to all who be in the darkness. G.F.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Simmons at the Bull and Mouth neer Aldersgate,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "ox Bishop" immediately after 'G.F.'; "May 25".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
